skillTree.localised_description: The swamp will rise again, its inhabitants enjoying the blessings of the Dark Gods once more.
Maybe it is the near-constant state of regeneration that gives the hide a toughened sheen, almost impervious to claw, talon or blade.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: These creatures are born to lead and marked for greatness, chosen the moment they hatch by the Fimir Matriarch of their stronghold.
The Fimir Noble's unnatural flesh twists and writhes to seal wounds moments after they are inflicted.
A creature of cunning and opportunism, the Fimir Noble can direct their warband to exploit the weaknesses of their foes.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can never have its Melee Attack reduced during battle.

effects.description:
Attribute: Unyielding Assault for Fimir Warrior units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can never have its Melee Attack reduced during battle.

skillTree.localised_description: Any living thing on the receiving end of a blow by a Fimir Noble's Baleglyph maul would be a crumpled heap of flesh long before the weapon's atrophic magic takes its toll.
The obscuring fog that shrouds the Fimir’s boggy fortresses follows them onto the battlefield, shielding them from more than just prying eyes and the harsh sun.

effects.description:
Attribute: Stalk for Fimir Warriors and Fimir Balefiend units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: Many are the dark horrors of twisted flesh and nightmares made real that the Ruinous Powers have visited upon the world, but few are quite as vicious.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Blink and you die.
Man-things, Elf-kind or stunted Dawi – it matters not, for all are mere insects to be trampled underfoot!

effects.description:
Bonus vs Infantry: +5 for Fimir Warrior units
	(Hero's army)

Armour: +10 for Fimir Warriors units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Adorned in the cracked skulls and battered trappings of those slain by their hand, this fiend is a born head-hunter, worthy of Norscan legend.
A constant hunger and lust for gold and shiny things; a talent for finding and lifting anything of value.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%

skillTree.localised_description: Fabric woven and tainted with primordial awareness protects while leaving the wearer light on their feet.
There is no knowing what ancient powers sleep in the in the under the water. To most, that is.
Knowledge of trails forgotten by the more civilized races eons ago allow the Balefiend to safely lead the army through the most dangerous of terrain.

effects.description:
Attrition: -5% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Few in Fimir society study outside of their caste, but this one has honed their martial prowess with a Fimm relative.
Mist follows the Balefiend everywhere, obfuscating his movements.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)

skillTree.localised_description: There is always another way.
Useful, if a bit impetuous.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +1% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +6% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description: Take it all!
Sometimes it’s best to have friends in low places.
Always watching.

skillTree.localised_description: They’ve all heard the stories of this one’s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(own characters in region)

Enemy Hero action success chance: -5%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 30% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

items.colour_text: The Fimir’s uniquely scaly skin allows the embedding of armoured plates to increase stature and resilience, though injury causes them to be swiftly shed!

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A Fimir noble is a grim, one‑eyed chieftain wreathed in swamp‑mist and ancient oaths.

enabled_if: Winds of magic power is 15 or greater
